item.title: Boosting and AdaBoost
item.description: Preliminaries Committee Boosting The committee has an equal weight for every prediction from all models, and it gives little improvement than a single model. Then boosting was built for this problem. Boosting is a technique of combining multiple ‘base’ classifiers to produce a form of the committee that: performances better than any of the base classifiers and each base classifier has a different weight factor Adaboost Adaboost is short for adaptive boosting.
